articles.title: Singapore-based Volopay has raised $29 million to expand to India - Business Insider India
articles.description: Singapore-based fintech platform Volopay on Tuesday said it has raised $29 million from Winklevoss twins -- Cameron and Tyler -- along with a global decacorn and others to enter the Indian market.
